verses.1: Kuama delh lohpi-in migilote tai mang a, mi thumante ahihleh humpinelkai bangin a hang uh hi.
verses.2: Gam sung mite a hoih loh ciangin a banbanin gam uk kumpi tampi nei uh a, ahi zongin mipil thungaihsun theite in gam sung thahatsakin kipsak uh hi.
verses.3: Mizawngte a bawlsia aana a nei mipa pen lo-a ante a susia gawp guahzu tawh kibang hi.
verses.4: Thukham a zui lo mite in migilote pakta uh a, thukham a zui mite ahihleh migilote tawh kilem lo uh hi.
verses.5: Mi siahuaite in thutang cih mel thei lo uh a, Topa a biate in ahihleh a kicingin a thei uh hi.
verses.6: Hau napi-in lungsim kawi mi hihna sangin zawng napi-in paubaan neih lohna hoih zaw hi.
verses.7: Thuhilhna a mang mite ta pil hi a, lawm gilo tawh a kikhawl mi in a pa mindaisak hi.
verses.8: A meet a pung lakna tawh a hau mipa pen mizawngte a hehpih mipa adingin sum a zonsak hi lel hi.
verses.9: Mi khat in thukham a zuih nop kei leh ama thungetna nangawn Pasian in zakthadah huai sa hi.
verses.10: A dik tat mi khat siatsak ding a hanciam pa pen ama tawh sa gum sung mahah kia ding hi. A dik mipa in gamh hoih luah dinga, migilo pa in bangmah luah lo ding hi.
verses.11: Mihau pa pen amah pil kisa a, ahi zongin a zawng mipil pa in a hau paʼ haina phawk khia veve hi.
verses.12: Mihoihte in vangliatna a ngah ciangin mi khempeuh lungdam uh a, migilote a liat ciangin a dangte in gimna thuak uh hi.
verses.13: A khialhna a im mite a daupai lo dinga, a mawhna pulakin a kikheel mite in hehpihna ngah ding uh hi.
verses.14: Topa a zahtak tawntungte pen mi nuamsa hi a, a lungkhauh mite in lungkhamna tuak ding uh hi.
verses.15: Mizawngte a uk migilo pa pen humpinelkai gilkial le vompi halungvei tawh kibang hi.
verses.16: Ngaihsut siamna a nei lo gam ukpa a gilo kumpi hi dinga, thuman tawh ngah ding bek a deih mipa in sau veipi uk ding hi.
verses.17: Mi thatin a khial pa in ama hankhuk ding a to ahi hi. Ama hankhuk tawh kho kei in.
verses.18: Thumanin a gamta mite lungmuangin om ding uh a, a zuau tat mite ahihleh puk ding uh hi.
verses.19: Nakpi takin lo a kho pa hau mahmah a, bangmahin a kimang tum lo na a sem pa zawng mahmah hi.
verses.20: A citak mipa in thupha tampi ngah dinga, a hau baih nuam mipa in gim tuak pelmawh ding hi.
verses.21: Mi langbawlna hoih lo a, ahi zongin letsong neucik khat hangin thukhente gamta khial thei zel hi.
verses.22: A huaiham mi in a hauh nadingin huai mengmeng a, a tawpna ah a zawn ding lamtak phawk kha lo hi.
verses.23: Mi khat tai-in thuhilh lecin tungtham a phatna sangin a tawpna ah lungdam zaw ding hi.
verses.24: A nu a paʼ neihsa laksakin, “Khialhna hi kei,” a ci pa pen guta mah hi veve hi.
verses.25: A huaiham mi in kitotna piangsak a, Topa a muang mite mihau hi ding hi.
verses.26: Ei le ei kimuanna haina hi a, mipilteʼ hilhna zuihna pen lungmuanna ahi hi.
verses.27: Mizawng a huhte cimawh ngei lo dinga, huhna a pia nuam lote in samsiatna ngah ding hi.
verses.28: Migilote a liat ciangin midangte bucip uh a, amaute a za kiat ciangin midikte in ukkik ding hi.
